content:
There is a 2 year postdoc position available in my group, involving collaboration with https://cyber.ee and https://guardtime.com, as part of https://chess-eu.cs.ut.ee.

Application deadline: 31 October 2023
Starting: 1 January 2024

Application website: https://candidate.recrur.com/public/jobad/EN/781baee0-6

The general idea is to use string diagrams as a resource-aware calculus to describe cryptographic and cybersecurity protocols in a principled way, at different levels of abstraction, taking inspiration from the work of Broadbent and @Martti Karvonen https://arxiv.org/abs/2208.13232.
